website_summaries.verdict: Good thickness on these chips and the right amount of saltiness.
pros: Not dry, but also not greasy
Good value in the small bags
cons: The expiration date on these chips might seem short

customer_reviews.title: This must be some sick joke
customer_reviews.text: I've literally been waiting for a week, super excited about receiving these since I can't really get them here. I finally receive the package half an hour ago, and I go to pick it up and find a package smaller than a shoe box. I'm like this can't be it obviously, I must have ordered something else that arrived before my chips. I open the box and literally find ONE BAG. Can someone explain how this is even possible?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on 1/4/19 and every package expires 1/29/19. UNACCEPTABLE!!! Item not eligible for return? C'mon...this is bogus.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Sealed and empty bags..,
customer_reviews.text: I like this style of chips but when I opened the box after delivery there were five empty bags and several more that feel only half full. I can tell there is a difference in volume and weight because there are some packages that feel right. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Pmiller

customer_reviews.title: Best Vinegar Chips Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Miss Vickie’s Salt & Vinegar Chips are the best I’ve ever tasted, hands down. I’m obsessed with vinegar chips, so I’ve tasted them all and none compare to these ones. I saw a lot of reviews for this product we’re negative , but i had no problems with my Shipment. No bags were opened. I bought these in December 2018, and you can clearly see the expiration date is feb 2019. If you love vinegar chips like i do, then you won’t regret trying these chips.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Expires in 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips, but I feel scammed after opening the box. Expiration date on the front of each bag is 1 month from now. That is not acceptable. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago PrimeMember

customer_reviews.title: The product expires a month after receiving them.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to eating these for the next few months. However, this product came with an expiration date For the following month. Now I understand that the expiration date is a guide. However, it is NOT the case for these particular chips. They will go stale faster than let's say a Doritos bag. I highly recommend not ordering these unless they can gaurantee the freshness. We have over 35 bags that are now not so fresh and taste gross.
customer_reviews.author: N Mayo

customer_reviews.title: I generally love chips, and like kettle chips...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't give this 5 stars because kettle chips are super hard on my teeth-and that's totally not their fault lol. I bought them so I could give my family variety on which chips they want to eat. They come with sea salt, jalapeno, salt and vinegar, and barbeque. All of the variety has 200 calories except sea salt, which has 210 a bag. It also comes with 28 chip pouches. Definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kamille Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Good product bad delivery service!
customer_reviews.text: The product is awesome always good and tasty. However, the delivery service this time was horrible ... instead of dropping it off on my porch as usual, this time they left my packages next to the trash. The trash of all things ... what the hell was this guy thinking that made him believe that leaving and edible item by the trash was a good idea instead of delivering to the porch? Amazon is really going down in quality. This is not the service that I’m paying prime for and I know there are others out there receiving the same or even worse service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Chips
customer_reviews.text: This is our second case of these chips. The first case we ordered in March 2020 the bags inside had a March 2020 expire date(tasted good). This case the bags inside are dated June 2020 and we are only in the month of April currently. These chips have an excellent taste and are the same as you buy at Firehouse Subs places.Hopefully Amazon will keep shipping these out with good expiration dates.
customer_reviews.author: J.Q.

customer_reviews.title: The reason why it’s cheaper than those that have less ...
customer_reviews.text: The reason why it’s cheaper than those that have less bags in a box is because the expiration date is literally 1 week after you purchase it. Hope you have a big family that can gobble a hundred bags in a week.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Way too salty and the flavorings are overpowering
customer_reviews.text: SO disappointed, had high hopes for a big treat. I got the variety pack and have tried them all - not a single one that I like besides the Smokehouse BBQ. 2 chips has a full day's quota of salt. Kinda tough too - bought in June and they expire July. I don't know if that's to be expected? Should have read the other 1-star reviews about being stale and out of date.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date too close to arrival
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these chips. In my area you can't buy them in convenient stores so Amazon is my only option other than going to Jersey Mikes. Problem is, the expiration date was only 3 weeks after I got them. I love them, but I can't eat 28 bags of chips in 21 days. I mean, I could....but I like to at least pretend to be healthy from time to time. If the seller could guarantee at least a 2 month expiration I would consider buying again but they really don't taste great after the expiration so I don't want to waste money again.
customer_reviews.author: Crispy72

customer_reviews.title: These vegan chips was good until......
customer_reviews.text: I've been a vegan for many years now and when l came across MissVickies chips l was very happy that l can now eat chips that isn't filled with junk trash ingredients. But that changed moments ago as l was eating the Sea Salt chips when l picked up something that wasn't a potato chip ( See Pictures ). Needlessly to say that I am not happy with a foreign object in my chips and now I'm extremely considering never to buy anything from MissVickies again. I wrote this for the company to throughly check there facilities because someone can choke on it or something worst may occur.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Colar

customer_reviews.title: Family loves them!  Convenient to buy the exact flavor we like in a larger quantity on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I started buying these because I was tired of buying variety multi -packs and my family would pick out their favorites and leave the ones they didn’t care for. These do not go to waste. The kids love them in their school lunches. The amount in the individual bags is perfect for teens. I will continue to buy because the quantity is good for older kids and the price is worth it because we are getting exactly what the family likes.
customer_reviews.author: Gina C.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Upset
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips, and so does one of my close friends. We bought the 28 pack with the plan of splitting it, 14 and 14. However, when I received the box, there were only 26. Obviously, it is not that big of a deal, but still. If it is advertised as a 28 pack, don't send 26 packs.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Tuscano

customer_reviews.title: Not sold in stores
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips! These are the best salt and vinegar chips I have had. They do not get the burning sensation that every other kind I've tried gives me, which can damage my tastebuds. These stay sour with a hint of sweet somehow. I hated not being able to get these in store, but using Amazon's subscribe&save to get 15% off, I got these for 50 cents a bag! And they will last me a while. The expiration date is at the end of June and I ordered these mid April. May be better for bigger groups!
customer_reviews.author: Aly K.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned reading the reviews that mentioned the early expiration dates, but my bags came with expiration dates in June so I’m happy with that. The chips are delicious and the price is exceptionally good. I am trying not to eat too many chips at one sitting during these days of staying at home when I am prone to snacking in front of the TV. These single portions are just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: shoebabe

customer_reviews.title: Was not disappointed at all !
customer_reviews.text: Every single flavor has been amazing . The packaging was fine when it came in . There was nothing wrong with any of the bags everything was closed. I have a dairy and preservative allergy and these were perfect for me . The chips were nice and crunchy , and the bags were full a good amount . The only thing I would say is I should of bought two when I had the chance , they sell out fast !
customer_reviews.author: yesenia fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good Chips
customer_reviews.text: Good packaging, box in a box, no crushed chips. Fresh. received 9/9/2020, expires 12/1/2020. Good price. Sea Salt and Vinegar flavor is not as good as Utz. Not quite enough vinegar. I thought I was going to be able to try the Vickies Crab chip, but my mistake, not in this combo. We (4) have gone thru 60 bags of Utz salt and vinegar, 60 bags of cheetos, 60 bags of cheetos puffs (im not proud to say) since Covid started. These make a good covid snack to leave on the guests lawn chairs. I wouldn't buy the Sea Salt and Vinegar again, given how good Utz is, but I still give it a strong rating.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: almost stale when arrived
customer_reviews.text: The current shipment of potato chips have an expiration date of 2/11/20 and the package was received on Jan 9th 2020. How am I to eat all 60 bags before the expiration date. The first bag was okay the second tasted a tad stale already. I will continue one more order (to be received in March 2020). If the third order expires less that 75 days out I will have to cancel my order.
customer_reviews.author: Diane  in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Crunchy & Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I first tasted these in Montreal--(I think they are available only in Canada). The potato flavor is wonderful--not overwhelmed by oil or too much salt. I especially like the texture--very crunchy, but not cut too thick. I LOVE potato chips--a "must" with sandwiches or onion dip; these are the best I've tried--EVER. When I'm in Canada, I pick up a case--to last all year until the next Northern trip. I did order a case of individual packs from Amazon, so they are available in the US in that format. YUMMY!!! WM
customer_reviews.author: Chilichick

customer_reviews.title: These chips are DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bulk box for sharing at the office. There were easily a few months left on the recommended use by date, but my coworkers made sure all the chips were eaten up within a week and a half after the box arrived. I think 3/4 of the box was gone in week 1. Everyone agreed the flavor is great, this crunchiness is superb, and the freshness when opening the bag is just wonderful. These chips are the key to becoming the hero of your office!
customer_reviews.author: Enju

customer_reviews.title: Most awesome chips!
customer_reviews.text: I'd never tried this brand of chips 'til recently @ a friends & they were soo delicious that I had to buy some more....by far & away the best potato chips ever. Flavor & crunch above & beyond. They enhance whatever you're eating from your sandwiches, burgers, or even just snacking right outta the bag....Highly recommend despite the extra cost. You get what you pay for! Update; 9/27/20 We are still working on these chips & they ARE quite fresh months later! Have no idea what other reviewers are talking about not being fresh enough?
customer_reviews.author: Carol Vette Girl

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of stale bags
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite chips, and the bags that were fresh were delicious. Unfortunately at least two of the bags had holes in them and were stale. I still have several left and hope there are no more issues. There’s nothing grosser than biting into stale food. Ewwww
customer_reviews.author: truth hurts

customer_reviews.title: Amazing chips
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best potato chips!! I found these at firehouse subs and couldn’t get enough of them so I went searching. I ended up here and found them cheap and in a good size for what I need. They always taste amazing and are a step above their rest ONLY CON: they expire usually I find within 2 months after delivery I’ve bought at least 5 shipments already
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kazel

customer_reviews.title: There were no sour cream chips
customer_reviews.text: I may be wrong about the name of the flavor I wanted but didin't get. I had eaten them at Subway. The other flavors were good and they were fresh, but I'm disappointed that the yummy ones they sold at Subway were missing. I like the convenience of buying a supply of chips because I often eat them when it's too late to go out to the store. I will probably buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Lil bags taste just as good😛
customer_reviews.text: These are honestly the best S&V chips I’ve ever tasted! When I saw a big bag was $35-$65, I seriously almost cried! I don’t even like chips!!! I got a few packs in a value/multi pack at a big box store for my daughter and OMG! I dared her to touch them! I don’t understand why you have to purchase them in small bags, but at this point ( 5 lbs later) enjoy the crap out of them😊😉☺️
customer_reviews.author: TheCadds

customer_reviews.title: Not as fresh as I would like
customer_reviews.text: I order these regularly approximately every 3-4 months. Unfortunately, the last box I received is very close to the "best before" date and most of the chips taste stale. I have had to throw out several bags. It also took more than two weeks to deliver, even though these are a subscription item. Up to now, the chips have been fresh and delivered promptly, so maybe it's just a fluke, an entire box (60 bags) of stale chips is pretty hard to swallow (pun intended).
customer_reviews.author: Robert Paege

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: The expiration date is December However they taste stale already. Disappointed with this batch as last batch was very good
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A great selection
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I think the Sea Salt and Vinegar and the Jalapeno flavors are the best, but the BBQ and regular Sea Salt are good too. They are a perfectly sized snack, and (as long as you stick to one bag) will keep you from overeating. Ordering them this way (especially as a subscribe and save item if you choose that option) is much less expensive than getting them from a vending machine or at a convenience store. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Addicting.
customer_reviews.text: Jalapeño kettle chips are definitely my downfall. I have a hard time putting them away when I buy the full size bag so buying them in bulk in small 1.375 oz size bags keeps me from eating too many. I’m glad I can get just jalapeño flavor from amazon. Sam’s club carries the variety pack but I just want the jalapeño flavor. Mine are all dated November 17 2020. No worries on my end of them going bad.
customer_reviews.author: trpsmom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: They arrived fresh and crunchy just the right amount of tanginess. I first tried them at Walmart only to find out that they were a promotional item. I could no longer buy the chips in the store which happens alot. I was so happy when I found them on Amazon. They expire in May of this year. The taste is contestant unlike some other chips that I have tried. Will buy again in the near future. It was hard to wait for them to be back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: cellis

customer_reviews.title: Great Chips
customer_reviews.text: Great Kettle Chips! Purchased the 4 flavor variety pack with Sea Salt, Jalapeno, BBQ, and Salt+Vinegar. They all tasted great and appears to use a little less oil in the cooking compared to other chips. The smaller bags helps us limit our daily intake. We really liked the chips and will purchase again. Didn't realize that Frito Lays has purchased Miss Vickies as the shipping box was marked "Frito Lays".
customer_reviews.author: KCTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: My personal favorite snack. Salty, flavorful, spicy but not too much. Kettle cooked so super crispy.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Everything checks out.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason tastes a little less flavorful than the ones I buy at the store, not sure if i'm imagining it though. Counted bags and checked for any punctured bags, all 28 bags arrived safely and don't expire for almost a month since delivery. Probably better to order a box with a household of 2 people to really make sure you finish 28 bags before they expire.
customer_reviews.author: Mateo

customer_reviews.title: I love these chips.
customer_reviews.text: Love these chips, and they were delivered with no problems. These chips are nice and crunchy and they are horribly greasy like some other brands of kettle chips are. I only gave 4 stars on the flavor because the jalapeno flavor variety is way too strong and over powering. My favorites are the salt and vinegar, and the BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: TheSpaceAvenger

customer_reviews.title: Happy Ending
customer_reviews.text: IMO the best chips since Eagle brand (would be happy to hear other nominations). Previously ordered two 42-bag boxes, both of which arrived unscathed. This last order, however, had a badly crushed corner. When I reported this, I was offered a free of charge replacement box and could keep the damaged one. Since I'm suffering thru a stretch of hassles with major appliances (for instance two 45 minute holds to get a Frigidaire human), to have a manufacturer treat you right is quite refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: spunkydog49

customer_reviews.title: My go to spicy potato chip
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved these and only saw them at sandwich shops and never at any grocery store. When I heard from a friend you could buy these on Amazon I jumped on it right away. I love these chips and they are my go-to spicy potato chip. I highly recommend these and to watch out for whenever they do sales because they are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: About to expire!!
customer_reviews.text: Short dated product, these all expire on June 16th, not happy to get something I’m going to eat and it’s about to expire
customer_reviews.author: Maxf099

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I had these on auto delivery for over a year, until my husband went on a diet. He would brown bag it 5 days a week and he just couldn't get enough of these. The value is wonderful, just use them by the sell by date, or they will go stale on you. My grandson's LOVE these as well. Gonna get them their own case for Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: corgigirl

customer_reviews.title: My Zesty Chips!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way the chips come so organized in the box you get enough for two months 64 bags they are so delicious and crisp and such a good value for the money and a brand with a great reputation The jalapeño flavor is outstanding and not too hot you can pair it with some guacamole or salsa and makes a great snack
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Best Chips Ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Miss Vickies potato chips but can never find them at my local grocery store. The salt and vinegar flavor is my most favorite potato chip and I was so excited to find them on Amazon. Fortunately the other flavors are really good as well, especially the jalapeno, though I wish I could buy the salt and vinegar ones in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lee

customer_reviews.title: Poorly stored. Stale
customer_reviews.text: You never know where these boxes were stored or who is selling them. It’s not alway Amazon. My box looked great and undamaged but the chips were stale like they were new old stock. It has the rancid smell. You know it’s bad when even salt & vinegar chips starts to change flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonshoe

customer_reviews.title: ANTS delivered inside product!!!
customer_reviews.text: WTF frito lays.... This is the second time I have ordered. This time my boxes came in damaged.. no biggie right... guess i was wrong. I opened up this bag and there is ANTS in my bag. I just freaking opened these and started eating them. My kids have been eating these, my husbands eats these. Next time I’m going to sams where I hope it’s safe!!! I contacted the company but no ones there. Buyer beware, you might be eating ants!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Expire quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is saying how these will expire whenever. I feel I got lucky, then. My first box expires in 1.5 months. This is fine, because I will finish this in 1.5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Tired & Dirty

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love these chips
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these chips. The only thing that was disappointing was that we had 2-3 weeks from time of delivery, to eat 64 bags of chips. Luckily I don't live alone, otherwise, I would have had to eat 3 bags a day to finish them in 3 weeks. I really wish that Frito Lays would make these delicious wonders more accessible to the general consumer. They are amazing, but had to deduct the star for the quick expiry dates.
customer_reviews.author: Ar1masenka

customer_reviews.title: best by an sell dates are for retailers
customer_reviews.text: info most products like these chips are generally still good 6 months after sell by date. keep in a cool place an they are fine. with all the salt an preservatives why are people so upset about short expire dates, as good as they taste that isn't a problem for my people we eat them up too fast.
customer_reviews.author: katz15

customer_reviews.title: Crispy !!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many Salt/Vinegar chips from different companies. These are very fresh... extremely crispy... well flavored. The flavor is NOT overwhelming... it's perfect. I will order these from now on. *first shipment from Amazon sent me the wrong item. They QUICKLY corrected the error and got me the correct chips within 48 hours of the mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Johnson

customer_reviews.title: One word:  Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: please use caution when buying these chips. I bought them on prime day and the expiration date was 3 weeks after receiving them. A lot of money and a lot of chips wasted. They tasted really gross after the expiry date. Total ripoff These are hands-down my most favorite potato chips. Heck, my kids even love them. Chips are thick with the perfect amount of saltiness.
customer_reviews.author: MsWestchester

customer_reviews.title: Best Kettle Chips Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a long time fan of kettle cooked chips and have tried various brands. Never have I ordered a family size box like this that was cooked and seasoned perfectly. It’s not oil, not overly salty; the flavour profile and cook is just perfect. I haven’t been able to limit myself to just one bag per day.
customer_reviews.author: Chanh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and crisp!
customer_reviews.text: They by far are the best potato chips ever!!!!! So crunchy and fresh and just enough salt! I can’t find them in a large bag but our family loves getting the smaller bags... they are really fresh and helps with portion control... I do cheat and have two now and them!! ❤️ FYI, There other flavors a great too!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Timmins

customer_reviews.title: Open bags due to tight packing
customer_reviews.text: The chips are great! Best flavor of any Kettle chip. The packing was awful. There were seven bags that were squished in so tight they popped open. Many other bags we're squished and only had crumbs for chips. Packing box had Frito-Lay all over it. I wonder if they could use a bigger box so I could get a better product. I would buy this again if I knew I wouldn't lose so many bags of chips during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J Case

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I usually get the Jalapeno flavor when I'm at a sandwich place but today they were out of them and I tried the salt and Vinegar. Fell in love with this flavor too and bought a box right away. Thick, crispy, and the salt and vinegar balance is just right for me. Not too salty, not too sour.
customer_reviews.author: K433Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The best chips!!!
customer_reviews.text: By FAR the best bbq chips out there. Chips are large and not all broken up as with other brands. Excellent flavor!!
customer_reviews.author: E. T. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ THIS BEFORE PURCHASING
customer_reviews.text: 1.I recieved the product with 5 bags open and damaged. 2. I purchased product in June, I recieved it June 15th and product has an expiration date of July 2020. 3. Product dose not taste fresh at all. Taste as though if it is soon to expire. 4. The bags of chips were just thrown into a box carelessly. 5. I would not recommend at all, i suggest try your local food bulk supply store first. Im very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: David Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great crispness, delicious flavor.
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good, I prefer Deep River Barbecue chips to these barbecue , but the flavor and crispness was great. Also made more healthy then the ones that have msg, etc in them. Those ingredients make me feel nauseous so I appreciate the good quality ingredients in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Minke

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Gosh this are SO delicious! I've been a fan of kettle cooked chips for a long time. And these, these are probably my favorite of them. Each chip is nice and crisp, with a delightful spicy bite :) The packages are the perfect size to eat alone, guilt free, or share with a friend. :) And these came packaged in a nice neat box. NOt so pretty for the shelves, but there's no wasted packaging or space! :)
customer_reviews.author: KnittyMermaid

customer_reviews.title: Great for lunches
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of these chips! They are so crunchy and flavorful. I bought these on sale so I could use them for lunches with my husband and kids, but I also enjoy that there is one serving size so I don't eat too many of them - trust me, it's tempting!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Out of date product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for home use noticed taste seemed to change over several months( I have bought these before) I noticed the sell by date was a week after I purchased them
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: Stale tasting
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered previously and been very happy but this batch was all stale and 3 of the bags had exploded so unsure if it was shipped and the box left in the heat but all the bags taste rotten. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Heath

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these chips
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these chips. And at this price is a fantastic deal but this batch I got was only about a 6 week sale by date ( for 64 bags)!! . When I got them before it was good for 3 months, so I'm a little reluctant for next time. They do start to get stale so the longer date is important.
customer_reviews.author: A HAMMER

customer_reviews.title: Good price but not very fresh
customer_reviews.text: I received these on June 8 and the expiration date is July 2. Basically 4 weeks to eat 64 bags of chips. Normally when you buy chips you have a good 2 or 3 months before they start to go stale but these have obviously been sitting around for a while before they were ever shipped. They are already starting to taste a bit stale and not up to the quality I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Mankey

customer_reviews.title: Burned through 2 boxes...should really stop
customer_reviews.text: Why aren't these more readily available at grocery stores? They are by far the best jalapenos kettle chips I've ever had. Shared it with family and friends and now all of them are fans. The chips aren't too thick and the flavor is full and zesty, not just a simple spicy tingle on the tongue. HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Expiration Dates!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered this, and the last time I ordered was a month ago. The product is fine and sells well (I stock them in vending machines), but my last order had an expiration date of Dec. 3 while my current order a month later expires Dec. 17. I really need them to not expire till January, so I feel like I'm losing money on these. Would love to keep ordering, but I need to know what can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshyahu

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips but I just got them and the expiration date is approximately 4 weeks from delivery date. It seems a very short time for chips sold in bulk?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I got 64 packs of these that would expire in a month!!
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: My Addiction
customer_reviews.text: My addiction are these chips. Only one major box store sells this brand, but with C-19, I’m not going into stores right now. I love that I can order these in this size. I’ve ordered twice since finding them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Best Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Good but expire within 30 days of delivery
customer_reviews.text: Chips are great but expire in one month. Its not right that these are sold expiring so quickly. Not right. I should have been informed of that before purchasing them .
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pallotta

customer_reviews.title: They're Ms. Vickie's!
customer_reviews.text: Miss Vickie's makes the best salt vinegar chips because they're not tart at all. Most salt vinegar brands taste overly sour and tart but Miss Vickie's just has flavor without your lips puckering or twisting up.
customer_reviews.author: Beezus

customer_reviews.title: Love the chips in general. Arrived super stale.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 6/29 with an expiration date of 7/28. I’ve tried three bags and all are stale. So stale. So so very stale and gross. I’m going to have to toss the entire box. Sad chips. How do you even get that wrong?
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Love these chips
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I tried the huge bag at Costco & like all things Costco they quit stocking them. I received these & they are great spicy but not too hot. 4* cause the price is too high.
customer_reviews.author: some beach

customer_reviews.title: The small bags taste WAYYYYYYYYYYY better then the big bags
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was going to get a bunch of bags full of air. The bags are over filled and taste way better than the big individual bag. Economical as well - I have two school aged children and a box will last a month and a half. Economical and practical
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's an interesting taste, I guess, although I do have to eat it with other food as it's a little too (sour?) for my taste. One bag did come stale, though. Overall, I do enjoy it, however.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Near-expiration date
customer_reviews.text: These chips are (generally, objectively) great, however, this particular box (delivered in May 2020) was near its expiration date (June 2020). I wasn't going to eat 64 bags of chips in one month, so now I am finding stale bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The chips arrived a day earlier than expected and the were a hit at our daughters birthday! The jalapeño was our favorite. They came in a box that was well packed inside another box so there were no crushed chips.
customer_reviews.author: Zigmont

customer_reviews.title: Best Chips Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips so much! They're perfectly flavored and crispy. I bought the box of 28 bags and it arrived perfectly, containing all 28 bags in perfect condition with an expiration date a few months down the road. Will definitely order them again!
customer_reviews.author: Fi23

customer_reviews.title: Yikes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this box of S&V chips. The chip bags are just thrown into a box with no wiggle room and sure enough, several, well many of the bags arrived with no air in the bags to keep them fresh. Therefore, I got quite a few stale bags of chips. I haven't tried the ones with air in the bags yet to speak on it's freshness. Unfortunately, this order was a flop. These use to be my favorite salt and vinegar brand. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON SOON TO BE EXPIRED CHIPS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: No where in the description it states that the chips will expire in 2 weeks of purchase. I received chips that is set to expire soon. If I would’ve known this was going to be the case than I would’ve never spend my hard earned money on this! This is very misleading and deplorable. Trying rake in people’s hard earned cash for soon to be expired garbage!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nara

customer_reviews.title: Tasty !!!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a good deal & they are good but I would not order again because some of the dates are too close to expiration . The individual bags have different expiration dates. I prefer a longer expiration. I can't eat them that fast!! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Almost expired
customer_reviews.text: I should read the reviews before ordering. The expiration date is within 30 days. I got 1 bag ripped open inside that i need to throw away. One of the review said that these chips are not meant for household order, then i’ll suggest that the seller would mention it. The chip doesn’t taste fresh like the one i got from nearby sandwich shop. Lesson learned, not to buy these chips from amazon anymore, i should just get it from costco...it just right now during the pandemic, i try not to go to supermarket as often.
customer_reviews.author: Kumala Sugono

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chips! Great crunch
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chips! Great crunch! Not too greasy. The jalapeno taste is awesome and it has just the right level of spiciness to them (I love spicy foods, so this will vary by person). I have tried all the other jalapeno flavored kettle cooked chips and these by far are the best! The only complaint, if I had to make one, is that it is a tiny bit too salty - but this will also vary by person. Overall, anyone that loves jalapeno kettle cooked chips, you should definitely consider trying these.
customer_reviews.author: Tsai Tsai

customer_reviews.title: Most. Excellent. Chips. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These chips are the best! If you've not tried them, I think you should. Caution however: These Chips are addicting! Also, buying this 28 pack is a great value. Saves tons of $ versus a Vending machine. From the crispness of the kettle cooked chips to the Jalapeno zing, these are perfect! Plus, they arrived early!
customer_reviews.author: Martimus Q

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snack size
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit with the entire family. The children loved being able to just pick a different flavor when they wanted a snack. We will definitely order them again!
customer_reviews.author: Potluck Queen

customer_reviews.title: So Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: My Co-worker stated me on these chips. Every time when I get a salad, I go straight for these chips. I will eat the chips and then the salad and afterwards, I get upset with myself because I wanted more chips. What I am really saying is that these chips are delicious!!!!
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: The best chips
customer_reviews.text: What can I say. I am in love with these chips. My job used to buy them for us. I could always find them in the break room. I searched my local grocery stores but they didn’t stock the brand. I think Costco or Sams may carry but I think Amazon has the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Not Miss Vickies!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chips because I love the variety pack that I usually get from Sams, but they only have a few of this flavor in the pack. Imagine my surprise and disappointment when I opened a bag and pull out a regular Lay’s potato chip and not the kettle cooked sea salt chips that I was expecting! Never will I purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love these chips!
customer_reviews.text: These chips are delicious. They are by far my favorite brand and finding a variety of small snack bags of it in my area is near impossible. The price is great also.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia N.

customer_reviews.title: Freshness date expired almost 2 years ago
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. My husband grabbed a bag for lunch this morning......went to unpack the rest and noticed that the guarenteed fresh date is Jan 2016. Hopefully, they don't taste too bad, but will not order again. He loves these chips and we haven't been able to find them elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: These chips are 🔥
customer_reviews.text: These chips have the perfect levels of heat and crunch. I love them. The only thing that could make them better is omitting the Whey Powder for those with a milk allergy or vegan diet.
customer_reviews.author: Tacoma

customer_reviews.title: A liitle toooo salty
customer_reviews.text: The product is a little tooooo salty, or too visited or too spicy. during the time work from home, I also order other brand chips, and compared with the major brand, this one is a little cost and little salty.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Expired Chips
customer_reviews.text: They shipped me expired chips. 10+ days expired past date from a 28 count box.
customer_reviews.author: XO

customer_reviews.title: This can’t be happening!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product on Sunday and I was so excited because I love Sea salt and vinegar chips by Ms. Vickies! So I waited 3 days for the box to arrive. When I got home from work and opened the box, I sat there and just cried. I really can’t believe not only did I not get the chips but they were the wrong brand and types of chips. It was an assortment of lays chips with Doritos, popcorn, cheese puffs. I am so mad right now!!! I have placed for them to be returned and replaced but I am so mad that I can’t be on my coach curled up with Netflix and my chips. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SHORT DATED
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE ....received these on July 8 & they are ALL dated July 28 expiration ! This is way too short date for a family ... Would be fine if we were throwing a party to use them all ! Not happy !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greasy but good
customer_reviews.text: Chips are more greasy then I remember from the past (but that could be an issue from just one batch. I do hope that they are not purposely so greasy). But I like that they only have three ingredients and other then the layer of grease across the top of my mouth, the flavor is good. And I like them
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Mcintier

customer_reviews.title: Gold Medal
customer_reviews.text: If there was world chips Olympics, this would be the pick for USA. Straight up the best chips produced from USA. Crispness to flavor everything is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Simple_Guy

customer_reviews.title: SOOO GOOOOD
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time trying these chips. And I'm glad I took the chance. The packing was a bit questionable because the snack bags they were just thrown into a cardboard box. That's something I wasn't expecting but it was secure enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sub Par Freshness Date
customer_reviews.text: Received 64 bags of chips on 1-3-20 with a freshness date of 1-14-20. Would have expected at least a 1-31-20 threshold. Product itself is outstanding. Distributor gets low marks for this delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: Best chips
customer_reviews.text: My favorite chips . However there was a bag of the barbecue chips that were rubbery and not cooked . Called the company and they are sending a coupon for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely worth buying ! Chips I ordered dont expire for another for another 3 months but it will be gone before that so I'm not too worried about it . Will definitely buy again .
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: how know the expiration date before order?
customer_reviews.text: all products Miss Vickie's, Jalapeno, Sea Salt, Sea Salt & Vinegar and BBQ are very good, people like them a lot. I order these products early december get expiring date of Jan29nd, about 45 days, I reorder the Jalapenos very early january and got them March 12th expiring date, excellent more than 60 days, when I reorder and got them on jan 21 the Sea Salt, BBQ and Sea Salt vinegar got them with expiring date within Febraury month. in my opinion will be good to know the expiring date of the product that you will receive just before order them this independently of the amount you order.
customer_reviews.author: Roca 4Health

product_meta.title: Miss Vickie's Sea Salt Flavored Kettle Cooked Potato Chips, 1.375 Ounce (Pack of 64)
product_meta.description: More than 20 years ago Miss Vickie started making her kettle-cooked potato chips on her family’s farm. To this day each batch is still prepared with the same care. Miss Vickie’s chips bring you the honest taste of long ago, full of tradition and the great taste you love.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
